resources.string: Calculate Fare based on Traffic and Night Charges!
From Local Trains to BEST Buses, just tap to get the fare of each Transport Mode used in your Journey!
Calculate the Calories you burn, next time you take a walk to your workplace!
Just key in the Source and Destination and compare each travel mode based on Fare, Time and Distance!
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
